message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I appreciate the compromise, but $14,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $12,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can we meet at $12,000?
